TidyUI.moduleSettingsActive.name: Always activate the Module Settings Tab.
TidyUI.moduleSettingsActive.hint: If you happen to visit the Module Settings often you might want to set this option so you don't have to click to activate the Module Settings Tab.

TidyUI.hideDisableAll.name: Hide 'Disable All Modules' Button.
TidyUI.hideDisableAll.hint: Check this if you want to hide the 'Disable All Modules' next to the 'Save' button.

TidyUI.uncheckAll: Uncheck all but Tidy UI modules
TidyUI.notice: Module list copied to clipboard - remember to save it!
TidyUI.paste: Paste your stored modules list here (old text format) or load a JSON file to set your active modules
TidyUI.instruction: In order to reimport your modules list you have to download the JSON file. Copy as text is only good for posting to Discord or alike. If you have saves in old text format it will still be recognized when you want to restore it.
